description: Provides a list of custom vocabularies that match the specified criteria. If no criteria are specified, all custom vocabularies are returned. To get detailed information about a specific custom vocabulary, use the operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Lists all custom vocabularies that have the status specified in your request. Vocabularies are ordered by creation date, with the newest vocabulary first.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is present in your response, it indicates that not all results are displayed. To view the next set of results, copy the string associated with the NextToken parameter in your results output, then run your request again including NextToken with the value of the copied string. Repeat as needed to view all your results.

nested_items.name: Vocabularies
nested_items.description: Provides information about the custom vocabularies that match the criteria specified in your request.

nested_items.name: VocabularyName
nested_items.description: A unique name, chosen by you, for your custom vocabulary. This name is case sensitive, cannot contain spaces, and must be unique within an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code used to create your custom vocabulary. Each custom vocabulary must contain terms in only one language.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the specified custom vocabulary was last modified.

nested_items.name: VocabularyState
nested_items.description: The processing state of your custom vocabulary. If the state is READY, you can use the custom vocabulary in a StartTranscriptionJob request.
